text:
It would be nice to have an ANT core task that would merge various javadocs - 
j2ee, struts, jdk, etc...

it could create a new merged javadocs directory.

Radu.

text: Have a look at www.dbdoc.org - if you want a merged view of JavaDocs, this is the answer!
